description: What’s your secret? Listen as anonymous callers from across the globe share what is hidden in their lives. It’s both a voyeuristic and affirming experience. Leave your own at 1-929-SECRETS (929-732-7387) or secretshotline.org.

items.content:
What’s that you are really stirring in your tea, honey, or bee vomit? Animal secretions that make us say yum!, Tonight, on Sick, Sad World.

items.title: Go Down Or I'll Cut You Off

items.content:
Warning! This is a heavier episode.


Listeners grapple with eating disorders.


If you or someone you know is dealing with an eating disorder, please visit https://nationaleatingdisorders.org/ or call 1-800-931-2237.


SECRETS!

1-929-SECRETS or https://secretshotline.org


MUSICS!

SUPPORTS!

items.title: Good Luck to Us

items.content:
There are many ways to say, 'I love you'

Just by being there when things are sad and scary

Just by being there, being there

Being there to say, 'I love you'

items.title: Taking Care

items.content:
Sisters who do drugs and what we do to/with/on our friends.

ALL music on this episode comes from Ranges. Check them out at https://www.rangesmusic.com/ !

Leave a secret! 929-SECRETS or secretshotline.org !

items.title: Your Friends and Sisters

items.content:
A listener calls into to tell of her romantic reconnection with an old friend in Damascus. A few days later, the Syrian-Turkish earthquake hits.

Places to help the victims of the 2023 Syrian and Turkish earthquake:

https://www.whitehelmets.org/en/?akid=6707.154198.O9ngi1&rd=1&t=9

https://molhamteam.com/en/wecan

https://fundraise.givesmart.com/vf/EarthquakeSyria

https://www.globalgiving.org/projects/turkey-and-syria-earthquack-emergency-response/

More places to help:

https://linktr.ee/turkeysyriaearthquake



See Privacy Policy at https://art19.com/privacy and California Privacy Notice at https://art19.com/privacy#do-not-sell-my-info.

items.title: Syrian Joy

items.content:
A caller discusses how finding a suicide note from her mom has upended her life and changed her desires for having kids of her own.

If you're having suicidal thoughts of your own, please call the 988 Suicide & Crisis Lifeline.

Leave a secret or feedback at 929-SECRETS or https://secretshotline.org

Support the show at https://loveandradio.org/member


See Privacy Policy at https://art19.com/privacy and California Privacy Notice at https://art19.com/privacy#do-not-sell-my-info.

items.title: A Small Passenger

items.content:
Only short calls this week--60 seconds and under!


Call 1-929 SECRETS or visit https://secretshotline.org


Playlist:

https://audiobulb.bandcamp.com/album/exhibition-100

Build Buildings - Indigo Bunting

Quiet Noise - Murmurations

Distant Fires Burning - A Festive Bulb Set On Fire Burning At Audio Distance

Justin Varis - L (Flagrantly Furled by He Can Jog

Offthesky - A Fine Day To Float


Support the show!

itunes.summary: A cavalcade of super short calls!

items.title: Shorties

itunes.author: Love and Radio
itunes.summary: What’s your secret? Listen as anonymous callers from across the globe share what is hidden in their lives. It’s both a voyeuristic and affirming experience. Leave your own at 1-929-SECRETS (929-732-7387) or secretshotline.org.

title: The Secrets Hotline
